channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump ramps up retribution campaign with push for Bondi to pursue cases against his foes
item.description: Eight months into his second term, President Donald Trump’s long-standing pledge to take on those he perceives as his political enemies has prompted debates over free speech, media censorship and political prosecutions.

item.title: Patrons at New Hampshire restaurant shooting prevented worse tragedy with selfless acts, AG says
Trump officials praise Charlie Kirk’s faith and his mark on the conservative movement
